a cool summer

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang·Baban", the game is located in the ocean cell at the beginning, land units can board ships and have the ability to enter the ocean cell, and pioneers can build cities in the sea area. +2 [ICON_Science] technology value and +2 [ICON_Culture] culture value every round before opening up the first city. Not subject to flood damage.
costume procession

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang·Bafan", civilian units +1 [ICON_Movement] mobility, no boarding movement penalty, and can enter the territory of other countries. Obtain an observation balloon when creating a city on a continent other than the [ICON_Capital] capital.
Shenwei Lingzhuang·Baban

All units ignore movement penalties caused by terrain and rivers. Immune to hurricane-type disasters, and the enemy suffers double damage from hurricane-type disasters. Cells around cities and regions automatically generate roads, and domestic roads are upgraded by one level. . [NEWLINE]Regions provide [ICON_Culture] culture and [ICON_Science] technology equal to [ICON_Production] production. [NEWLINE]All units +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power, and gradually increase [ICON_Strength] combat power with the evolution of the times, if there is unused movement power, the combat power will be improved; all enemy units -1 [ICON_Movement] movement power, if there is unused movement power The movement power used reduces the combat power. [NEWLINE]If you are the first civ to get aviation units, all aviation units get an [ICON_Promotion] boost.
game master

Will attempt to maximize [ICON_Gold] gold output from its cities and [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes. Respects civilizations that do things like it, dislikes civilizations that don't. [NEWLINE]Admiring civilizations that explore the world, and dislikes people who huddle within their own boundaries. [NEWLINE]Try to build an air force. Envious of civilizations with powerful air forces. Hate civilizations with weak air forces.

Eight Dance Sisters characteristic area. Allows you to build and store aircraft in the area. It replaces the airport area and is not subject to population restrictions, and the cost is lower. Cannot be built on hills. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM] Aluminum per turn. +10% [ICON_Production] production in the city where you live. Based on the project area, a small amount of [ICON_Science] technology value is provided every round, and [ICON_GreatGeneral] general points are provided after completion. [NEWLINE]When carrying out the project, all aircraft stationed in the city's airport area get +2 experience points every round; after completion, all aircraft stationed in the city's airport area get +4 experience points.

hurricane rider

high speed rail

Can only be built by Military Engineers. Does not cost uses, but costs 1 point of [ICON_IRON] iron and 1 point of [ICON_ALUMINUM] aluminum to build. The [ICON_Movement] movement speed of any unit moving from one railway tile to another will be greatly increased. The [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route that overlaps with the high-speed rail can get multiplied gold coins from its destination area.
Penetrator

Yamai Yaguya unique naval transport unit. Instead of an aircraft carrier, it transports air units. [NEWLINE]Cannot attack, but can intercept air strikes. With a unique reinforcement tree, research and development of information age technology can directly unlock upgrade items.
bonder

Skyrunner

The characteristic building of the bunny girl eight dances. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] +1 [ICON_Amenities] satisfaction and +2 [ICON_Gold] gold, +1 [ICON_Culture] culture, +1 [ICON_Food] food and +1 [ICON_Production] production. In a city with an [ICON_Governor] executive, there is an extra +1 [ICON_Amenities] satisfaction and +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins. If it is adjacent to the city center, entertainment center and water park, each will have +1 [ICON_Culture] cultural value. As you progress through the technology and civic trees, you can gain additional [ICON_Culture] culture, [ICON_Tourism] tourism, and [ICON_Housing] housing. Only one golf course can be built per city and cannot be adjacent to other golf courses. A tile with a golf course cannot be exchanged. +2 [ICON_Appeal] Charisma.

Yawu was originally an elf, but when he appeared in the world, one elf was divided into two, each with independent personality, and his abilities were also divided into two parts. One of them is Yaguya. With orange hair and mercury pupils, the hair is rolled up behind the head, the body is relatively slender, and the personality is lively. She always has a queen-like arrogant and powerful attitude, and she can also speak in a dramatic diction, but this It's just a deliberate effort to give herself the majesty of an elf, and when she gets emotional, she will return to her normal way of speaking.

Yawu was originally an elf, but when he appeared in the world, one elf was divided into two, each with independent personality, and his ability was also divided into two parts, one of which was Yuxian. The girl with golden-orange long hair tied into three long braids has a plump body and a better figure than Yamai Yaguya, but she often squints her eyes listlessly, and is calm and docile like the opposite of Yamai Yaguya's personality . The position of the shackles of the spiritual outfit is the opposite of Yaguya's, tied on the left wrist and left ankle.

The original "Son of the Hurricane" was a fusion of Yamai Yaguya and Yamai Yuzuru. To be precise, it changed from two people back to one person. What I like is heavy metal music, and what I hate is Chrysanthemum chrysanthemum.
